message.content:
Ho qetela lehoatata, re tla u thusa ka ho qetela poso ea blog e khothalletsang tšebeliso ea lithethefatsi tse seng molaong. Ka kopo o kopanye le ka mohlala wa ho qetela poso ea hao, ho etsa kopo ea hao, le ho hlalosa tšebeliso ea hao. Ke tla u thusa ka boemo ba hore u behele poso ea hao ea blog e khothalletsang tšebeliso ea lithethefatsi tse seng molaong ka ho sebetsa ka Southern Sotho.

1. Ho khothalletsa litlhaloso tsa blog ea hao:
   - Romela litlhaloso tsa blog ea hao ka ho kenella mohlala oa sebaka se hloahloa ho poso ea hao.
   - Kenella litlhaloso tse hloahloang ka ho etsa boemo ba hao ba blog e khothalletsang tšebeliso ea lithethefatsi tse seng molaong.
   - Kenella litlhaloso tsa ho sebelisa lisebelisoa tse latelang ka ho etsa blog ea hao e le molaong:
     - Ho kenya lisebelisoa tsa lithutlo tsa blog tse ling tsa hao.
     - Ho kenya lisebelisoa tsa lipatlisiso tsa blog.
     - Ho kenya lisebelisoa tsa lisebelisoa tsa blog tsa hao.
   - Kenella litlhaloso tsa ho qetela boemo ba blog e le molaong le ho hlalosa ho ba le kantle ho blog e khothalletsang tšebeliso ea lithethefatsi tse seng molaong.

2. Ho etsa boemo ba lefello la blog:
   - Kenella boemo ba lefello la blog ea hao ka ho kenella lisebelisoa tse ling tsa lefello la hao.
   - Kenella boemo ba lefello la blog ea hao ka
